name: Sinclair Action Pack: Lightgun Games
description:
Sinclair Action Pack - Lightgun Games was a bundled with the Magnum Light Phaser, a Sinclair branded light gun.

Side A
  • Missile Ground Zero - Software Creations
    Four terran ground bases are under attack from alien invaders. The bases have to be protected by shooting the aliens with your lightgun. Bonus UFOs occasionally float across the screen that can be shot to replenish your ammo.
  • Solar Invasion - Mastertronic Ltd
    Light blobs representing escaped alien zoo animals float up the screen, you have to shoot them with your lightgun. Alien queens that have to be shot multiple times generate more blobs. Your spaceship can be moved to the left or right by shooting arrows on the right side of the screen.
  • Operation Wolf - Ocean Software Ltd
Side B
  • Rookie - Mastertronic Ltd
    As an army recruit it's time for some target practice. Shoot the targets as they pop up, the sooner you get them the higher the score will be. There are eight levels of increasing difficulty.
  • Robot Attack - Software Creations
    The robots are taking over. They appear from the top, landing on platforms looking for crates that if opened assemble a piece of the super-droid. Your task is to terminate them before the droid is assembled.Each shot changes the colour of the robot until at purple it blows with the next shot.
  • Bullseye - Macsen Software
